IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO PROMOTE, FOSTER, AND MAINTAIN THE INTEREST OF THE PEOPLE IN MUSIC THROUGH CONCERTS AND EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO PROMOTE, FOSTER, AND MAINTAIN THE INTEREST OF THE PEOPLE IN MUSIC THROUGH CONCERTS AND EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS.
IRS990.Desc: CONCERTS TO PROMOTE, FOSTER AND MAINTAIN THE INTEREST OF THE PEOPLE IN SYMPHONIC AND CHAMBER MUSIC.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: EDUCATION AND OUTREACH: MENTOR PROGRAM, A SCHOOL-TO-WORK ACTIVITY FOR HIGH SCHOOL STUDENTS INVOLVING MENTORING SESSIONS AND JOINT CONCERTS. YOUNG PEOPLES CONCERTS, FREE CONCERTS FOR AREA 4TH, 5TH AND 6TH GRADERS TO BUILD AN INTEREST IN MUSIC.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: MARKETING: INCREASES AWARENESS IN THE COMMUNITY OF OUR EXISTENCE AND HELPS INCREASE SALES.DEVELOPMENT: TO APPROACH INDIVIDUALS, FOUNDATIONS AND COMPANIES FOR DONATIONS GRANTS, ETC., TO BRING IN FUNDING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MEMBERS ARE THOSE PERSONS, INCLUDING CORPORATIONS AND ASSOCIATIONS, WHO MAKE A PAYMENT TO THE ASSOCIATION AS A CONTRIBUTION, AVAILABLE FOR CURRENT EXPENDITURE IN ANY FISCAL YEAR, IN THE SUM TO BE SET BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EACH MEMBER SHALL HAVE ONE VOTE AT ANY MEMBERSHIP MEETING HELD DURING OR FOR THE FISCAL YEAR FOR WHICH SUCH CONTRIBUTION WAS MADE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY IS REGULARLY REDISTRIBUTED AND SIGNED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE DETERMINES COMPENSATION FOR THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR.
